messages.subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Conference in NC
messages.msgSnippet: OK, that s what I needed to know. Thanks! ... From: kbcdlovejo@aol.com  To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com Sent: Wednesday, May 23,
messages.messageBody:
OK, that's what I needed to know. Thanks!


----- Original Message ----
From: "kbcdlovejo@..." <kbcdlovejo@...>
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, May 23, 2007 5:47:07 PM
Subject: Re: [unschoolingbasics] Re:Conference in NC



-----Original Message-----
From: Cameron Parham <acsp2205@yahoo. com>

I just wondered...there is a chance that I may be able to attend but
I am not
likely to know until quite close to the conference date. How
spontaneous can
attending be? I realize that food and sleeping space wouldn't be likely
at the
last minute--I am only asking about attendance. Thanks.

-=-=-=-=-

Well, the way the camp works is that you don't have to sleep there, but
you *must* buy a meal plan. So it can't be *too* last minute. My
numbers are supposed to be in to them by August 5. So I'm asking
everyone to be paid up by July 31 to allow us a few days to confirm our
numbers.

So the final date would be July 31. Absolutely no "day of"
registrations any more.

~Kelly

Kelly Lovejoy
Conference Coordinator
Live and Learn Unschooling Conference
http://www.LiveandL earnConference. org

____________ _________ _________ _________ _________ _________ _
AOL now offers free email to everyone. Find out more about what's free
from AOL at AOL.com.



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
